dmca.title: [ABUSE] RE: ROLEX WATCH U.S.A., INC.
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, January 14, 2005 12:53 PM
To: Gaf Counsel
Cc: admins@theplanet.com; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Re: [ABUSE] RE: ROLEX WATCH U.S.A., INC.

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.
- --
Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html

Gaf Counsel wrote:
| January 14, 2005
|
| BY EMAIL: abuse@theplanet.com; admins@theplanet.com
| AND FIRST CLASS MAIL
| ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.
| 1333 North Stemmons Freeway
| Suite 110
| Dallas, TX 75207
|
| RE:  ROLEX WATCH U.S.A., INC.
|
| To ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.:
|
| This firm is general counsel to Rolex Watch U.S.A., Inc. ("Rolex"),
the owners of the federally registered Rolex Trademarks: ROLEX,
PRESIDENT, SUBMARINER, YACHT-MASTER, DAYTONA, GMT-MASTER, DATEJUST and
Crown Device (among others).
|
| We are writing to request your assistance with a website hosted by
your service that is selling counterfeit Rolex products.
|
| The www.watchlovers.net website offers counterfeit and infringing
Rolex watches for sale.  Such illegal use of the Rolex Trademarks is
likely to cause confusion and constitutes counterfeiting, trademark
infringement and dilution of Rolex's intellectual property rights in
violation of both federal and state laws.
|
| Pursuant to ThePlanet.com's policies and the requirements of The
Digital Millennium Copyright Act ("DMCA"), please note the following:
|
| 1. Signature of the undersigned set forth below.
|
|
| 2. www.watchlovers.net is selling counterfeit Rolex merchandise and
the sale of counterfeit merchandise is prohibited by law (15 U.S.C.
